name: Town (Nikita Lapkov)
description:
How to play

You are the mayor of a tiny town on the northern border of the country. A long time ago there was a castle and you are tasked with restoring it. The restoration process is quite expensive though!

You can construct buildings, which will help the community of your town prosper and give money for castle restoration. On each turn, you throw a dice. Depending on the dice value, some buildings are activated and pledge money to the town hall.

Beware though, all buildings except town hall decay over time! One building can only be activated a fixed amount of times before it falls apart. You need to manage between saving money for the castle restoration and keeping the town's infrastructure working.

Good luck!

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. Game Jam theme: "Roll of the Dice".

Controls

Desktop: [x] corresponds to X key, [z] corresponds to Z key. Use keyboard arrows to navigate.

Mobile / Controller: [x] corresponds to ❎ button, [z] corresponds to 🅾️ button. Use d-pad to navigate.
